meter_reading.notes: The odometer wheels clearly display 02271.1, which corresponds to 2271.1 m³. The small red needle points to the 4th small tick mark after the 0.02 indication on the circular dial, representing 0.024 m³. Applying the rule to interpolate to one decimal tick (0.01 resolution), 0.024 is rounded down to 0.02 m³. The total reading is 2271.1 + 0.02 = 2271.12 m³. The needle angle is calculated based on a 360-degree dial representing 0.1 m³, so 0.024 m³ corresponds to (0.024/0.1)*360 = 86.4 degrees relative to the 0.00 mark.
